articles.title: Venus hotter than ever: third robotic explorer on the horizon - CGTN
articles.description: A week after NASA announced two new missions to our solar system's hottest planet, the European Space Agency (ESA) said Thursday it will launch a Venus-orbiting spacecraft in the early 2030s.
articles.content:
A week after NASA announced two new missions to our solar system's hottest planet, the European Space Agency (ESA) said Thursday it will launch a Venus-orbiting spacecraft in the early 2030s.

articles.title: Venus: European Space Agency mission aims to unlock mysteries of 'Earth's twin' - Sky News
articles.description: Venus is the most Earth-like planet in size, composition and distance to our sun - but its surface is about 450C (842F).
